mainPage.title: Import/Export Data
mainPage.description: Seamlessly migrate your business data in and out of Dott. Import from spreadsheets or other accounting software, and export your data in multiple formats. Our AI-powered field mapper makes importing data quick and accurate.

importCard.title: Import Data
importCard.description: Bring your existing data into Dott from Excel, QuickBooks, or other sources.

exportCard.title: Export Data
exportCard.description: Download your Dott data in various formats for backup or use in other applications.

aiFeature.title: New Feature: AI-Powered Data Mapper
aiFeature.description: Our intelligent field mapping system uses Claude AI to automatically match your data fields with Dott's database structure, making imports faster and more accurate than ever.

step1.title: Step 1: What would you like to import?

products.label: Products/Services
products.description: Product catalog with prices and inventory

step2.title: Step 2: How would you like to import?

shopify.label: Shopify
shopify.description: Import products and customers from Shopify

errors.selectDataType: Please select at least one data type to import
errors.limitReached: You've reached your monthly import limit ({{limit}} imports). Please upgrade your plan for more imports.
errors.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeds limit. Maximum allowed: {{maxSize}}MB

exportPage.title: Export Options
exportPage.subtitle: Configure how you want to export your {{dataTypes}} data
exportPage.noDataSelected: No data types selected for export

excel.label: Excel (.xlsx)
excel.description: Best for reimporting or further analysis

csv.label: CSV (.csv)
csv.description: Universal format, compatible with all systems

tips.title: Export Tips
tips.excel: Excel format preserves all data types and relationships
tips.csv: CSV format is best for universal compatibility
tips.pdf: PDF format is ideal for reports and documentation
tips.large: Large exports may take several minutes to complete

success.message: Export complete! Your download should start automatically.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

dataMapper.title: Data Mapper
dataMapper.subtitle: Map your Excel columns to Dott fields for {{dataType}}

aiAnalysis.title: AI Mapping Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Claude AI has analyzed your Excel file and automatically mapped {{mapped}} of {{total}} columns with high confidence.

dataMapper.requiredNote: * Required fields must be mapped before importing

errors.requiredFields: Please map the following required fields: {{fields}}
errors.aiLimitReached: You've reached your monthly AI analysis limit ({{limit}}). Manual mapping is still available.
errors.analysisUnavailable: AI analysis unavailable - please map manually

aiInsights.title: AI Import Insights
aiInsights.description: Most errors were related to number formatting. Consider using consistent decimal separators and removing currency symbols from price fields before importing.

accessRestricted.title: Access Restricted
accessRestricted.message: Import/Export functionality is only available to Admin and Owner users.
